text: Capitol Punishment was a professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) event made by WWE. The event took place June 19, 2011 at the Verizon Center in Washington, D.C.. It was the first Capitol Punishment event. Eight matches overall took place, with all of them airing live on PPV. ==Matches== # Match Stipulations 1 Dolph Ziggler beat Kofi Kingston (c) Singles match for the WWE United States Championship 2 Alex Riley beat The Miz Singles match 3 Alberto Del Rio beat Big Show Singles match 4 Ezekiel Jackson beat Wade Barrett (c) Singles match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 5 CM Punk beat Rey Mysterio Singles match 6 Randy Orton (c) beat Christian Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 7 Evan Bourne beat Jack Swagger Singles match 8 John Cena (c) defeated R-Truth Singles match for the WWE Championship ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Capitol Punishment website Category:2011 in professional wrestling Category:World Wrestling Entertainment pay-per-view events Category:2011 in the United States Category:2010s in Washington, D.C. Category:June 2011 events
title: WWE Capitol Punishment
